#summary Android Market Sales Plotter

Using the same method as [http://www.anddev.org/viewtopic.php?p=30732 described here], this app fetches sales records from Google Checkout, then creates a histogram of them to be plotted with ChartDroid.

You can [http://code.google.com/p/chartdroid/source/browse/#svn/trunk/market_sales browse the code here].

Android download link:
http://chart.apis.google.com/chart?cht=qr&chs=350x350&chl=http%3A%2F%2Fmarket.android.com%2Fdetails%3Fid%3Dcom.googlecode.chartdroid.market.sales
